attributes.action: learn what democracy is supposed to be about
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dictatorship is telling us you know best.
Democracy is putting the facts before a group of people and asking their opinion.

At the moment this MINORITY government (I remind you that you were elected by a minority of the people you govern) is DICTATING the future of this country by signing a treaty for which it KNOWS there is no popular suppor or mandate.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
